attributes.action: Instruct the United Kingdom to Boycott the Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The time has come for the UK to distance itself from the farcical "competition" that is the Eurovision Song Contest.
After watching last night in utter disbelief at the blatant lack of authentic rewarding of points, I have come to the decision that as a nation we no longer have to set ourselves up for this annual opportunity for the rest of Europe to slap the UK in the face.
Points are clearly not awarded on the quality of the song but for neighbouring nations to demonstrate an unequivocal need to stay politically comfortable with eachother.
Our stance on certain affairs has clearly clouded the judgement of other European neighbours, so the competition is dead in its current form.  Rename it - You Slap Our Back and We'll Slap yours, and While Your At it Stick Two Fingers up at the UK 2008! - Catchy

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
